definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: shout at, si vera l. (Ar. hawta c. 9ly shout at, threaten, dialect. for hayta, cf. De Ps 62:4 who camp. Damascene hawta 9ala fula0nin rush upon one with cries and raised fist, cf. further Wetzst in De; so MV SS: Thes al. assign to [[[התת]]], attack; txt. dub.)—only

definitions.title: Po.
definitions.body: Impf. [[תְּהוֹתֲתוּ עַל־אִישׁ]] Ps 62:4; but Hup Che rd. [[תְּהוֹלֲלוּ]] be frantic against, cf. Ps 102:9.
